title: BobbyCast Preview: Jon Pardi
itunes:title: BobbyCast Preview: Jon Pardi
description:
Jon Pardi talks about moving from Northern California to Nashville to write songs and become an artist.  He explains how he got stabbed pretty badly in a fight just before the move, his early touring days ...to where he is now with his next album. He also talks about how his relationship with girlfriend has changed him.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
